pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extending Lasso Model Fitting to Big Data // Extend lasso and elastic-net model fitting for large data sets that cannot be loaded into memory. Designed to be more memory- and computation-efficient than existing lasso-fitting packages like 'glmnet' and 'ncvreg', thus allowing the user to analyze big data with limited RAM doi:10.32614/RJ-2021-001.
